translation.cashPDF.title: Cash Payment Reference
translation.cashPDF.message: Make your payment at any authorized location. Mention that it’s a service payment, provide your reference number, the amount, and the agreement (PayCash or RedEfectiva) found below each payment network’s logo.
translation.cashPDF.commissionDisclaimer: Payment locations charge an additional fee.
translation.cashPDF.expirationDisclaimer: After this date, you’ll need to generate a new reference.
translation.cashPDF.banksTitle: You can pay at any of the following locations:
translation.cashPDF.payDisclaimer: Once the payment is made, you’ll receive a confirmation email. If you have any questions, email us at ayuda@wispok.com
translation.cashPayment.title: Cash
translation.codiData.title: Transfer details
translation.codiData.qrSection: in the CoDi® section of your
translation.codiData.scan: Or scan from another mobile device in the same section.
translation.codiData.payment: Make the payment from your banking app
translation.codiData.step1: 1) Open your banking app and go to the CoDi section.
translation.codiData.step2: 2) Use the QR reader in your app to scan the CoDi shown here or upload the screenshot of the generated CoDi.
translation.codiData.step3: 3) Confirm the payment in your app and return to this platform to see the confirmation.
translation.codiPayment.title: CoDi®
translation.codiPayment.whatIs1: CoDi is a payment method developed by the
translation.codiPayment.whatIs3: that allows you to make transactions using the
translation.codiPayment.whatIs4: QR code we’ll generate for you.
translation.speiData.title: Transfer details
translation.speiData.description: Complete the payment from your banking app using the following information:
translation.speiData.howToTransfer: Verify the data matches exactly, otherwise the transaction won’t complete. If your bank auto-fills the fields, edit them with the following:
translation.speiPayment.modalErrorMessage: There was an error generating the reference, please try again.
translation.speiPayment.title: Bank transfer
translation.modal.declinedSpei: Make sure the entered data matches what we provided.
translation.modal.declinedBank: Your payment couldn’t be processed due to a problem with your bank. If the issue persists, contact them.
translation.modal.success: We have sent the voucher to your email. You can view it or share it with the button below.

translation.expiredLink.solution3: to select Wispok as your payment method.
translation.payed.title: Payment has already been made
translation.payed.message: The payment process for this link has been completed and the receipt has been sent to your email.
translation.proofOfPayment.title: Payment receipt
translation.error404.title: Error 404
translation.error404.message: Sorry! We couldn’t find the page you were looking for.
translation.error404.solution: Please choose Pay with Wispok again from the homepage.
